2.name: Exam_paper
2.description: Your next paper ouch card in the round deals +1 damage

4.name: Dave_the_school_boy
4.description: Your paper ouch cards deal +1 damage during the first round

9.name: Cut
9.description: Stop all enemy healing this round

10.name: Butter_knife
10.description: Deal 1 damage and switch card I and V on both sides

11.name: Edgemaster
11.description: You can redraw up to 2 scissor cards at the start of each round

12.name: Math
12.description: Switch card I and IV or II and V on every side

13.name: Spitball
13.description: Deal 1 damage this card ignores block

14.name: Black_pen
14.description: The damage you take this round against paper is reduced by 1

15.name: Stun
15.description: Prevent the enemy woah card from activating and set it

16.name: Cheat_sheet
16.description: Deal 1 damage if this card is switched set it

18.name: Locker
18.description: Block 1 damage deal damage equal to the not used block value

19.name: Flex
19.description: If your HP is higher stop all enemy rock cards from activating this round

20.name: Clean_edge
20.description: Deal 1 damage for every scissor card that did no damage this round

21.name: Outspeed
21.description: Reveal your next turn card and activate it instead of this one but pass your next turn: povuci jos jednu lajnu

22.name: Dj_RichieSwitchie
22.description: Once per round you switch two of your set cards. Can only be used on turn start

23.name: Push
23.description: This round after every card that blocked enemy damage your next ouch card deals +1 damage

24.name: Big_joe
24.description: All of your block cards count as rock and they block 1 more damage

26.name: Happy_bear_patch
26.description: Heal 3 HP but stop all other healing this round

27.name: Sudden_swing
27.description: If the card before this one has no text deal 3 damage as rock

28.name: Nap
28.description: Heal 1 hp this card couns as a card with no text

30.name: Recovering_Addam
30.description: After every turn you didn't take damage heal 1 HP. This character does not heal at the round end

31.name: Daemon
31.description: At the end of the first round deal 3 damage to his own HP instead of healing

32.name: Powerbubble_soda
32.description: Heal 1 HP and your next ouch card this round deals 1 more damage

33.name: Comet_punch
33.description: Does damage equal to the combined damage you dealt this round as rock

34.name: Switcherobot
34.description: Switch cards I and V and II and IV on both sides and set them

35.name: Telekinesis
35.description: Block 1 damage. Stop all card switching this round

36.name: Nail_step
36.description: If this card would be set deal 1 damage instead. This card can not be negated

37.name: Dental_checkup
37.description: If this card would be set deal 1 damage instead. This card can not be negated

38.name: Windown
38.description: Deal 1 damage your next card counts as a card with no text

39.name: Doodle
39.description: Your woah cards with no text also block 1 damage this game

41.name: A_letter
41.description: Block 1 damage set this card on turn end

42.name: Flower
42.description: Switch two enemy set cards. You choose one and the enemy chooses the other
